title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Machine Learning Model Design and Evaluation for Heart Disease Prediction

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze a heart disease dataset to explain key features and data preprocessing steps
Learners can implement heart disease prediction models using KNN, SVM, ANN, and CNN models and compare their accuracy
Learners can evaluate model performance by calculating classification accuracy, precision, and recall metrics
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
